org.openntf.domino.i18n

Class FormulaMessageProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openntf.domino.i18n.MessageProvider
      • org.openntf.domino.i18n.FormulaMessageProvider

  • public class FormulaMessageProvider
extends MessageProvider
    Extends the MessageProviderImpl to handle formulas in text. You can use <! @Formula... !> to inline formulas in your .properties or <#1#>..<#9#> to access the optional parameters in getString/getInternalString. If the last optional parameter is a Map<String, Object>, this Map is treated as contextMap in the formula engine.
    Author:
    Roland Praml, FOCONIS AG
